text: Kargino () is a rural locality (a village) in Kayrakovsky Selsoviet, Mishkinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 556 as of 2010. There are 6 streets. == Geography == It is located 22 km from Mishkino, 4 km from Kayrakovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Mishkinsky District
title: Kargino
